name: worker-proxy
description: thread-local proxy for a given service spawned in dedicated Worker thread

scripts.predist: mkdirp dist && rimraf dist/* && cpx src/index.js dist
scripts.dist: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dist:proxy" "npm run dist:worker" && npm run bundle
scripts.build:proxy: mkdirp build/proxy && rimraf build/proxy/* && tsc -p src/proxy -outDir build/proxy
scripts.build:worker: mkdirp build/worker && rimraf build/worker/* && tsc -p src/worker -outDir build/worker
scripts.example: npm run dist && npm run example:bundle && npm run example:serve
scripts.preexample:bundle: mkdirp spec/example/dist && rimraf spec/example/dist/* && cpx spec/example/src/index.html spec/example/dist
scripts.test: npm run test:proxy && npm run test:worker
scripts.test:coverage: rimraf spec/reports/coverage && npm run test:coverage:proxy && npm run test:coverage:worker && npm run test:coverage:serve
scripts.test:coverage:proxy: rimraf spec/reports/coverage/proxy && karma start spec/proxy/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/proxy/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage/proxy -t html
scripts.test:coverage:worker: rimraf spec/reports/coverage/worker && karma start spec/worker/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/worker/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage/worker -t html
scripts.test:ci: rimraf spec/reports/coverage && npm run test:ci:proxy && npm run test:ci:worker
scripts.test:ci:proxy: karma start spec/proxy/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/proxy/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage/proxy/lcov.info -t lcovonly
scripts.test:ci:worker: karma start spec/worker/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/worker/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage/worker/lcov.info -t lcovonly
